conference.title: Announcing PHPConf.Asia 2016. CFP Opens Now!
conference.summary: **Announcing [PHPConf.Asia 2016](http://2016.phpconf.asia) - The Pan-Asian PHP Conference - CFP Opens Now**
conference.content:
**Announcing [PHPConf.Asia 2016](http://2016.phpconf.asia) - The Pan-Asian PHP Conference - CFP Opens Now**
The second pan-Asian PHP conference will take place between 22nd and 24th August 2016 in [Singapore](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singapore) - the Garden City of the East! Monday, 22nd August 2016 will be a **Tutorial** day. Followed by 2 days of **Conference**.
Come and meet with the fastest growing PHP communities in Asia. More than 300 attendees are expected in this single track conference.
[CFP Opens Now!](https://cfp.phpconf.asia/). Hop over to <http://2016.phpconf.asia> for more details.
